bibl.title: Aeschylus' Theoroi and Realism in Greek Art.
bibl.note: Suggests that some form of realism has inspired Aeschylus, and that this realism, in Aeschylus' terms, can more aptly be said to apply to Late Archaic art than to Early Classical.
bibl.seg: STIEBER Mary, Aeschylus' Theoroi and Realism in Greek Art.
Suggests that some form of realism has inspired Aeschylus, and that this realism, in Aeschylus' terms, can more aptly be said to apply to Late Archaic art than to Early Classical.
